title: Black Screen FIX For UEFI Video Card
body:
Anyone who has the problem of game crashing with black screen and monitors go out.  Post here and I will post the fix for UEFI VIDEO CARDS ONLY.  AND I will explain.

GO!

replies.body:
I didn't know if this; how odd. I've never seen anyone posting about having this issue specifically with the card.

It's good that you're offering a solution and putting it on the boards so that people can find it via a search engine. All I hope is that it's not a virus or anything you're trying to spread.

Good faith!
